NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Page not found
NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The page you are looking for does not exist.

RATELIMITED.TITLE: Rate limited
RATELIMITED.DESCRIPTION: You are being rate limited. Please try again later.

INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.TITLE: Internal server error
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.

FORM_GENERIC_ERROR: An error occurred while submitting the form. Please try again later.
MAX_FILE_SIZE: The file size exceeds the maximum allowed size.
